body.name: ARM & HAMMER Essentials Deodorant - Made with Natural Deodorizers - Coconut Geranium - Free From Aluminum, Parabens & Phthalates, 2.5 oz (Pack of 2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 20 mins
features: PURE INGREDIENTS: Made from ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, a natural deodorizer
body.description: ARM & HAMMER Essentials Aluminum Free Deodorant Coconut Geranium will remind you of a beach vacation with soft floral notes. Essentials combines natural plant extracts and Arm & Hammer Baking Soda to absorb and fight tough odors. Made with ingredients you know and trust, Arm & Hammer Essentials is aluminum, paraben, phthalate, and colorant free and won’t cause yellow stains your clothes. No matter what your day brings, the refreshing scent and light plant-based fragrances of Arm & Hammer Essentials will keep you smelling cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite
reviews.reviewText: Like others here, I have very sensitive skin. Most deodorants turn my armpits a dark color in addition to irritating the skin. Often making my pits extremely itchy and red after a few weeks of use. This would happen with many natural deodorants too, since the concentrated essential oils were often too strong.I was previously using Lume antibacterial deodorant, which didn't darken or irritate my skin. It also worked decently well at keeping away BO. But the deodorant itself also had a bit of a strange odor underlying it. And I was getting paranoid about contributing to antibacterial resistance.So I decided to switch back to a more traditional stick deodorant. This arm and hammer deodorant smells good, and lasts like a regular deodorant, as far as I can tell.I would say it will reliably covers any sweat and BO in the applied areas for up to 24 hours. It lasted through me working on my truck for about 4 hours in 80-90 degree weather, and I was sweating pretty heavily at times.Also lasts through my work day and then some, I'm usually logging a minimum of 10,000-15,000 steps between uses.It does turn my armpits a bit dark, but so far no irritation after a couple months use.Pros:-Works for me! 24 hours of moderate/lightly active movement.-No irritation.-Smells good.-Goes on clear, turns white, then goes clear again.Cons:-Darkens armpit skin.-Doesn't really smell like coconut per se, just flowery with a hint of vague *tropical* scent.-It does turn white for a bit while adjusting to body temp, may affect your clothes.If it doesn't seem to be working for you, try applying a bit more than usual and see how it goes. Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smell at a good price.
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy the coconut smell but not overwhelming. The price is good and it being always available is a bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: At this point after yearsssss of trying out deodorants without aluminum because of Cancer .. I finally found one that goes with my body hygiene. The smell is amazing and it lasts for a few hours without making me feel uncomfy.Hopefully because of the brand I don’t hear bad reviews about something else in this deodorant. 🤞🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best smelling deodorant
reviews.reviewText: Arm and Hammer makes the best aluminum-free deodorant that actually works. I wouldn’t say it lasts for 24 hours as advertised, but a good several hours. I keep an extra stick in my bag at work just in case I need to reapply. Have been wearing this brand for years and the coconut fragrance is the best!
